data.title: Graphic Design Junction
data.meta_description: New fresh free fonts are looking elegant, classy, easy to read, stylish, easy to remember, and easy to use. These free fonts are the best choice for logo
data.text:
New fresh free fonts are looking elegant, classy, easy to read, stylish, easy to remember, and easy to use. These free fonts are the best choice for logo design, quotes, album covers, posters, business cards, and many other design projects. Fresh fonts are 100% free to download and used in commercial work. The fonts collection included handwritten brush fonts, script fonts and typefaces perfect for logotypes, badge, packaging, headline, poster, t-shirt/apparel, greeting card, and wedding invitation. The following fonts are ideal to make an attractive design and fit for any artwork. Take a look at beautiful, bold condensed, vintage, sans serif commercial fonts for professional design, based upon suggestions from designers and web developers all over the world.

You may be interested in the following related articles as well.

Procreate Tutorials: 27 Best Tutorials To Learn Drawing Illustrations

30+ Creative Logo Design Inspiration #94

Free Mockups: 45+ Photoshop Mockup Templates

30+ Best Logo Mockups

20+ Free T-Shirt Mockups PSD

Fresh Free Fonts (16 Fonts)

Free fonts are available for Windows and MAC in truetype and opentype format. Check out more high quality free commercial fonts and update your font library as per new trends.

These fonts are perfectly made to be applied especially in logo design, and the other various formal forms such as invitations, labels, magazines, books, greeting / wedding cards, packaging, fashion, make up, stationery, novels, labels or any type of advertising purpose.

List of Free Fonts:

1. Nifty Free Font 2. Hallyeet Free Font 3. Saguaro Free Font 4. CircleFantasy Free Font 5. Tablón Free Font 6. Patrízia Free Font 7. Calypso Free Font 8. Psychedelic Cowboy Free Font 9. Akersy Free Font 10. Futuria Free Font 11. Lezerno Free Font 12. Northing Script Free Font 13. Techfont Free Font 14. Nedele Free Font 15. Memesique Free Font 16. Sebatas Teman Free Font

Cholane – Monoline Handwritten Font Font

Cholane is a Monoline Handwritten Font combined with a script so it looks elegant, there are ligature features in it, suitable to support a variety of designs and your business.

Font Download

Korgen – Serif Font Font

Korgen, is a elegant serif font that is sure to stand out! A little bit retro and a bit modern, Korgen. is great for logos, editorial or web design. The unique sharp serifs mixed with thin strokes give off a bold mid century architectural vibe.

Font Download

Kamuela Font

Introducing Kamuela Font! This font has a flexible shape and unique size as a script font, look very dynamic and beautiful.

Font Download

Caligature Hunters Modern Script LS Font

Caligature Hunters is the one of our fonts suitable to complement your digital and printed creative products. This font is perfect for posters, social media posts, branding, personal projects, etc.

Font Download

Vantely-Elegant Sans Serif Font Font

Vantely is a modern sans serif font. Made for any professional project branding. It is perfect for printing, branding and quotes. Every letter has a unique and beautiful touch.

Font Download

Rosewell Font

Rosewell, presented with 7 font variations with different accents. Rosewell has a very interesting font type and sans serif, script to be combined so that it is more elegant and amazing.

Font Download

Rosterine – Condensed Font Font

Rosterine is a condensed display typeface with the touch of nostalgic and vintage feel. This typeface has unique looks and strong characters.

Font Download

Aprictoos Signature Brush Font Font

Aprictoos is a signature brush font modern casual and smooth brush stroke font includes opentype features Ligatures. It support multilingual more than 100+ language. This font is suitable for logo design, Movie Titles , Books Titles and any awesome project you create. Make stunning work with Aprictoos font.

Font Download

Bovino Font

Bovino is a display serif font family. It was formed in a strong and sharp characters. The moderate x height and high contrast strokes make it attractive for titles and large size usage. Bovino contain more than 400 glyphs which covered broad Latin languages, its consist of 9 styles from thin to black with each matching italics.

Font Download

Qaishar – Serif Font Font

Qaishar is a timeless and classic serif typeface that looks incredible in every context. Perfect for logos, branding, invitations, and more, Qaishar will quickly become a staple in your font book. It looks gorgeous in all caps with a wide-set spacing if you want to try a classy look, or beautiful on its own in capital and lowercase letters for something completely timeless.

Font Download
